text: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already.
author: Tommy Cooper

text: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

text: I told my wife the truth. I told her I was seeing a psychiatrist. Then she told me the truth: that she was seeing a psychiatrist, two plumbers, and a bartender.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

text: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
author: Les Dawson

text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

text: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

text: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
author: Robin Williams

text: I asked my North Korean friend how it was there, he said he couldn't complain.
author: Unknown

text: I was wondering why the frisbee kept getting bigger and bigger, but then it hit me.
author: Unknown

text: I told my dentist my teeth are going yellow. He told me to wear a brown tie.
author: Les Dawson
